name: Save the World!
description:
Wander around the beach and the surrounding areas, pickin up trash to raise money in support of cleaning the world's oceans.

Made for Bow Seat's Ocean Awareness Art Contest

- Controls - 

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move character around

SPACE: Make an Action (pick up nearby trash, talk to other volunteers, drop litter off)

ESC or P: Pause the game, and Save your progress if desired (stored as cookies)

TAB or I: Check your trash bag to see what you've picked up.
